thread.title: JEAN DOTSON ALTIC
thread.title_full: Nebraska Furniture Mart reviewed by JEAN DOTSON ALTIC

author: JEAN DOTSON ALTIC
title: JEAN DOTSON ALTIC
text: Love online experience. Had to replace my oven range and microwave on short notice. I'm sick and can't go anywhere. Got my items ordered and will be delivered this weekend when I am healthy again and didn't have to leave my house!
